LightningComponentBundle.description: This component creates a related list enabling to show listed records that have advanced relationship models

property.label: Icon Name
property.name: iconName
property.description: Icon to show on the Card. Use utility icons.

property.label: Card Title
property.name: cardTitle
property.description: Title to be shown on the Card

property.label: Query Data
property.name: queryData
property.default: SELECT Id, Status, CaseNumber, Type FROM Case WHERE AccountId = {0} AND Account.AccountNumber = {1}

property.label: Field Mappings
property.name: fieldMappings
property.description: Comma separated list of Field Mappings to change later on Apex to do Query

property.label: Table Columns
property.name: tableColumns
property.description: Columns to be shown on the datatable

property.label: Lines to Show
property.name: linesToShow
property.description: Quantity of lines to show when the Related List is collapsed

property.label: Preview Items
property.name: flatPreviewItems
property.description: To show list of reduced items on startup
